name: Lawful Good
desc: These creatures can be counted on to do the right thing as expected by society.
common: gold dragons, paladins, and most dwarves

name: Neutral Good
desc: These folk do the best they can to help others according to their needs.
common: many celestials, some cloud giants, and most gnomes

name: Chaotic Good
desc: These creatures act as their conscience directs, with little regard for what others expect.
common: copper dragons, many elves, and unicorns

name: Lawful Neutral
desc: These individuals act in accordance with law, tradition or personal codes.

name: Neutral
desc: Those who prefer to steer clear of moral questions and dont take sides, doing what seems best at the time.
common: lizardfold, most druids, and many humans

name: Chaotic Neutral
desc: Creatures who follow their whims, holding their personal freedom above all else.
common: many barbarians and rogues, and some bards

name: Lawful Evil
desc: These creatues methodically take what they want, within the limits of a code of tradition, loyalty, or order.

name: Neutral Evil
desc: Those who do whatever they can get away with, without compassion or qualms.
common: many drow, some cloud giants, and yugoloths

name: Chaotic Evil
desc: These creatures act with arbitrary violence, spurred by their greed, hatred, or bloodlust.
